QuestData.Title: Teldrassil: The Burden of the Kaldorei
QuestData.Description: You must now visit the moonwell that rests under the boughs of the Oracle Tree, far to the northwest. The first and most powerful of our wells, its waters are said to possess the very essence of Elune's Powers.$B$BRetrieve a phial of its water and return to me. I will meet you at the crossroads in front of Darnassus when your task is complete.
QuestData.CompletionText: To be in the presence of the Oracle Tree... it is almost to feel wisdom take form.
QuestData.RewardText: Along with the druids, the Oracle Tree has been carefully monitoring the growth of Teldrassil. Our observations have been disheartening, but all is not without hope.$B$BThe tree is indeed recovering since its blessing, but the growth is still somehow stunted... hindered.$B$BWe suspect some portion of the corruption remains within the tree, waiting to be cleansed. We simply need to find it.
